titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Designates minority membership on the following standing committees of the House of Representatives: (1) Foreign Affairs; (2) House Administration; (3) Public Works and Transportation; and (4) Rules.
